Title: Amarillo
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Jonathan Glatzer, Ann Cherkis (executive story editor), Gordon Smith (story editor)
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: Jimmy struggles with client outreach and decides to shoot a TV commercial for Davis & Main. Mike begins an investigation.
